name: Simseru
message:
[Misc]
!getstats command can now be used by players to be able to do your own math/theorycrafting.

[Melee Damage]
Melee Damage pDIF formula adjusted to increase effective attack cap.
pDIF is (Attack/Defense) the old ceiling was 2.25. The new ceiling is 3.75. This will unlikely effect regular player damage unless extremely geared and with perfect party compositions. The main goal of this is many weaponskills have attack modifiers which could not break through this ceiling resulting in many weaponskills having lower than expected damage output. 

[Mobs]
Mob TP gain formula has been adjusted. Previously all attacks would have a (baseTP +30) so 1 handers that attack fast proc the additional +30 significantly more often than 2 handers. This has been dialed back to +10 to see how this feels.

Mob TP usage formula has been updated. Previously mobs would have immediate WS usage under these criteria.
100% to 51% HP with 3k TP.
50% to 26% with 2k TP.
1%-25% with 1k TP.
This remains in place but there is another layer to add the potential for mob WS usage outside of this rigid system.

If a mob has 1k or more TP and the above criteria is not met there will be a chance (TP/150) to use a WS on an incremental server tick. IE. if a mob is at 83% HP and has 1749 TP it will be (1749/150) an 11.66% chance per server tick to use a WS. If the mob manages to reach 3k TP before the chance successfully procs it will then trigger a forced WS using previous code.

This should help with 2 things:
[1] Previously if a mob is at 51% or higher its TP moves are all at 3k strength which is max modifiers for big potential dmg.
[2] Reduce mob predictability.

Please provide feedback on player experience when interacting with the reduced mob TP gains and the additional potential for mobs to choose to use a WS.

[Drops]

name: Simseru
message:
Ranged Weaponskills:
After some testing last night there seemed to be an underlying issue with ranged attack PDIF formula not taking into account your base ranged attack(being attack derived from your innate skill in the weapon so missing roughly 300 ranged attack at 75) properly. This resulted in ranged WS damage being calculated off only your bonus attack from gear and effects. Ranged weaponskills should see a noticeable bump in damage.

Please report any strange ranged weaponskill behavior.

damage = CHR + Singing Skill divided by 1.5

name: Mikey
Simseru
message:
Geomancer is now unlockable. Talk to Sylvie in Lower Jeuno near the Auction House for unlocking, AFs and majority of your spells.

The unlock and AF quests are all pretty light weight.

Unlock quest is available at lvl 30 like all other jobs.

DAT modifications will be required for all the AF, many spells, merits, etc. Will post a zipped updated version of all the dat changes required.

Geomancy spells are all tuned down for needing 600 skill instead of 900 skill for max potency. This is not currently obtainable in the game but will as more gear is added.
Currently you will cap at 450 Base + 60 from merits + 20 from current gear == 530/600.

Other notable changes:
Full Circle no longer despawns your Luopan. It will now move the Luopan to the player to assist in roaming parties and mana-management. Full circle also grants 125 TP each use, similiar to SMN solution to gather TP to maintain aftermaths as we move forward.
To not remove the ability to get rid of your Luopan it can be despawned simply by summoning another one.
Luopan will be despawned when receiving a level sync effect.

GEO has been added to the Relic Club tree and the Empy Club. Neither have had aftermaths crafted for GEO yet.

GEO spells from the unavilable zones have been moved to the current world.
4 Have been moved to Ru'Aun gardens. 1 near each god spawn.
1 to Dragons Aery. Near Fafnir/Nidhog.
1 to Behemoths Dominion. Near Behe/KB.

While alot of work and play testing went into this, I did also want to get it out ASAP so please provide any feedback and quirkiness.
I caught alot of bugs, performance issues and some quality of life ideas from playing it the past 2 weeks but I am sure there is plenty else to do.

Haste was nerfed from the base 29.9% ceiling to 20.0% for now and will watch all the spells for needed tweaking.

name: Simseru
message:
Forgot to mention masteries:
Mastery 1-3 are currently active, mastery command not updated.
Mastery 1: Use 100 Indi spells and gain 2x Duration and 2x Range for your INDI spells.
Mastery 2: Use 100 Geo spells and gain 2x Range and a 50% Reduction in the Luopans native HP down effect.
Mastery 3: Use 100 entrusts and cooldown reduced to 6 minutes. (Matches INDI duration for permanent 3 buffs.)

name: Simseru
message:
Ranged Acc added to Indi & Geo Precision as it was missing.
Ranged Attack added to Indi & Geo Fury as it was missing.

name: Simseru
message:
Relic weapon skills have all increased in power. 

1H FTP: Is now 3.75 // 4.25 // 4.5
2H FTP: Is now 2.75 // 3.25 // 3.5

The extra FTP on 1H should help close the gap that 1H's lag behind due to the large difference in base weapon damage. This may need to be altered depending on how it plays out. Please provide feedback on how 1h relics are performing against 2h relics.

There should be no scenario where TP Bonus weapons using non-relic WS's out perform Relic WS's.

Namas Arrow and Coronarch remain unchanged for now while I think about what to do.

WSNM weapon skills will all be dialed back tomorrow to ensure the power growth is linear from WSNM >> Relic >> Empy. 

Empy's will all be adjusted in the near future to ensure power growth from the Relics in a similar fashion.

name: Simseru
message: Yells should function properly in all zones finally.

name: Simseru
message: GEO Aura's should now properly be lost on death and not persist from the dead players body or after raise.

name: Simseru
message:
Some avatar changes are now live. This should affect not only player avatar pets but probably also the avatar prime mobs and anything else that uses the same abilities.

The preparation time for blood pacts to execute has been reduced from 3 seconds to .5 seconds. This means when a summoner hit a blood pact the blood pact would go on cooldown, cost mana and then 3 seconds later the ability would complete. This causes some challenges with how fast paced merit parties are as well as just annoyances that other classes don't have to face. 

When you Hastega with garuda you shouldn't have to watch people walk away while she charges for 3 seconds and  they walk out of haste range anymore.


GEO magic bursts with -ara spells should now show the correct magic burst messages.

name: Simseru
message:
1Handed Multi Hit WSNM Weapon Skills have been adjusted down in power.
Overall FTP mods are now 2.5 // 2.75 // 3.0 

This applies to:
Evisceration
Black Halo
Decimation
Asuran Fists (with the FTP adjustment to balance the 7 hit nature of this, the STR mod has been adjusted up to 1.0 like the other WS's of this tier.)
Blade: Ku (this currently remains STR .5 and DEX .5 but the stat split likely hurts the WS over all as well as deviates from Metsu and Hi, will likely migrate to STR 1.0 for uniformity in gearing)
Savage Blade

Something similar will also happen to the multi-hit weapon skills that were previously buffed for the lvl 60 and 65 weapon skills.

name: Simseru
message:
Geomancer base TP gain from Full Circle has been reduced from 125 to 25 as it seemed way too strong/reliable while leveling. 

Full Circle Effect merit now grants an additional 20 TP return when using full circle per point to get back to the 125 value while at 75 after being fully merited.

name: Simseru

Coronarch aftermath now procs even if it misses or does 0 damage.

GEO merit Mending Halation now functions.

name: Simseru

name: Simseru
message:
[General]
HELM rates increased from 50% to 75%
Guard, Parry, Shield no longer require the event to occur to get skills ups. Skill to mob level requirements remain unaltered.
Added Vrtra moldy weapons to Joachim's scripting to be able to be traded.
Ensured all moldy items are non tradable and non vendorable on server side.

[Warrior]
Provoke cooldown reduced to 15. Enmity increased 3x.

[Beastmaster]
Fight cooldown reduced from 10 seconds to 3 seconds.

[Summoner]
Shiva should now correctly be affected by SMN mastery.

name: Simseru
message:
[System Changes]
{Sparks}
Sparks of Eminence NPCs in Bastok, Sandoria and Windurst are now active.

Warp/Reraise items are purchasable.
Skill Up tomes are purchasable.
Equipment from 1-70 is purchasable.
Equipment from 71+ will not be purchasable.
AMAN exchanges will not be purchasable.

If you attempt to purchase an item that is not available you will currently not get a failure message or anything, it just won't work.

Sparks will now be awarded from shiny/slime mob kills.
Spark calculation will be (200 - ( 2 * player level)).
Examples: 
Killing a slime at level 15 will award 170 sparks.
Killing a shiny at level 75 will award 50 sparks.

This will reward lower level parties at a higher rate to allow newer players access to buy sparks equipment.
Please provide feedback on the spark acquisition rates and current equipment that is accessible.

{Shinys/Slimes}
[NOT THE STARTER SLIMES]
Shiny/Slime mob types at Crawler's Nest and lower will now have an EXP buff that will soften the EXP reduction per kill as players level allowing these camps to retain there EXP/hour longer.
** This change will be active the next time that mob respawns, so right now the first death will not have the bonus exp as I am not going to reboot the server again. Going forward, After they have all died or server reboots this will not be the case.
Shiny/Slime mob types at Crawler's Nest and lower will have their respawns set to 3 minutes.

These changes should help lower level parties be more consistent.

--
With these changes new players should be able to maintain some baseline equipment while they progress but the NM and many crafted gear will still be ideal while leveling.
Lower level sync parties should now have less friction from higher players to syncing down.

name: Simseru
message: All shiny type mobs are now a 3m respawn.

name: Simseru
message: Accuracy penalty removed from Sidewinder and Slug Shot as it doesn't make sense with the WS changes made for everyone else.

name: Simseru
message:
Most alchemy items that impose a medicated effect will now last 30-60 seconds instead. If anything lasts longer let me know and I will take a look at it.

Eventually I want to let most alchemy consumes stack so people can carry potions/ethers for use and have them actually get used at all.

[Ranger]*Pending Reboot
Recycle trait is now baseline available at 20/35/50 for 10%/20%/30% + Recycle Merit for additional 25%.
This should now work for ranged auto attacks as it previously only worked for WS's.

[Corsair]*Pending Reboot
Recycle trait that was available at 35/65/75 will now 'actually' be available for corsairs.

name: Simseru
message:
Afflatus Solace will now grant the WHM 25% of the amount cured as TP in addtion to the current stoneskin effect. (this includes overhealing)
This will be subject to % tweaking to find a healthy rate.

name: Simseru
message:
With the feedback provided the EXP bonus percentage on the Crawler's Nest and lower Shiny mobs has been reduced. The goal is for these levels to be better than they originally were and more desirable but not 2-3x the exp rate of the parties when you get to 40+ camps. The EXP sub 40 should still be very good, but not so much better than the other ranges. 

Please continue to provide feedback while we pinpoint the desired outcome.

name: Simseru
message:
[Scholar]
Fixed multiple issues with Accension conflicting with WHM Mastery 2.
 Storms will no longer persist through level syncing effects.

[Dancer]
 Animated Flourish now costs 1 Finishing Move, has a 15 second cooldown and generates 3000 Enmity.
